name: Professor Finn
text: What a convenient device you have!

name: Zed
text: Yes, this device can collect garbage like a magnet.

name: Professor Finn
text: Finally, someone saves the sea from the devastating effect of the garbage in the sea.

name: Zed
text: I also think that. But sorry, we are in a little hurry as we have to find parts of the ship of my partner.

name: Deemo
text: Wait Zed! He might have a clue of where we might find some parts.

name: Deemo
text: Mister, did you see any object that is like part of a spaceship?

name: Professor Finn
text: I donâ€™t have a problem giving you information, but can you do some favor for me? Can you two collect '25' Garbage for me.

name: Zed
text: No problem. So did you see any object that is like part of a spaceship?

name: Professor Finn
text: Nothing in particular, but I did see a beautiful meteor shower falling in the sky.

name: Deemo:
text: Can you tell me the trajectory of the meteors?

name: Professor Finn
text: If you keep traversing this path, you might eventually find the crash point of one meteor. But for the others, I am not sure.
